sentences.sContent: She thought for a moment before answering.
He still hadn’t answered my question .
sentences.sCn: 他仍然没有回答我的问题。

sentences.sContent: ‘Why don’t you just leave?’ ‘I’d like to,’ she answered, ‘but I have nowhere else to go.’
sentences.sCn: “你为什么不一走了之？”“我倒是想走，”她回答说，“但是我没有其他地方可去。”

sentences.sContent: How much was it? Come on, answer me.
...surrounded by students who quickly supply the verbal answer while I am still processing the question...
...insists that the answer to that last question is yes...
...Women want to be able to do it all volunteer for school parties or cook delicious meals，and so their answer to any request is often Yes...
...Her answer so surprised me that I decided to ask some of the other developers who were also parents what their domestic ground rules for screen time were...
...it's natural to look for what may appear to be the most“practical” way out of the problem:“Major in a subject designed to get you a job” seems the obvious answer to some...
...They’ll be able to answer the questions of students who are in their class directly via the interactive book...

phrases.pCn: 见多识广；自命不凡；好象什么都知道的样子
温和的回答；轻轻的回答；委婉的回答
答案；题解；练习答案（解答）

words.tran: 应负责任的；可回答的；有责任的

trans.tranOther: to say something to someone as a reply when they have asked you a question, made a suggestion etc
